The Click app.question: How can I participate in the Click?
The Click app.answer: Everyone over the age of 12 can participate in the Click, free of charge, throughout Belgium. The Click is a free app that everyone can use. Download the Click app for iOS or Android, register and get started right away. You are already doing it at home, but now you can do it any time, anywhere. Thank you for making the Click.

The Click app.question: Does my phone support the Click app?
The Click app.answer: You need a modern smartphone to start using the Click app. You will also need access to the App Store or Google Play store. Check your smartphone settings to ensure that your location and camera are shared when prompted. In the menu for individual app permissions (settings → scroll down → click on The Click), change your location permission setting to ‘Always’.

The Click app.question: Is the Click app secure?
The Click app.answer: We have taken all reasonable steps to protect your personal information: Register via the app. To activate your account, click on the activation link in the e-mail you receive from us. Log in via the app and get immediate access. We respect all the existing privacy and GDPR rules.

The Click app.question: What features does the Click app offer?
The Click app.answer:
Collect litter and scan or take a photo of it to receive a reward 
 Scan or take photos of your own empty packaging on the go 
 Order vouchers you have earned via the web shop 
 View your Click history 
 Claim awards to earn Circular UCoins faster 
 Map: you can record your walks and indicate whether the area was clean or not 
 Inbox 
 View transactions 
 Your profile

The Click app.question: Do I have to purchase the Click app?
The Click app.answer: No, you don’t have to purchase the Click app. The app is free for everyone who registers.

The Click app.question: Is the Click app available for international users?
The Click app.answer: You can use the Click app throughout the territory of Belgium. Would you like to use the Click app outside Belgium? Send an e-mail to theclick@fostplus.be

The Click app.question: How can I submit a complaint?
The Click app.answer: You can submit a complaint via the contact form, or send an e-mail to theclick@fostplus.be.

The Click app.question: What are the system requirements for the Click app?
The Click app.answer: You only need a modern smartphone and an internet/4G connection.

The Click app.question: Can I register without an email address?
The Click app.answer: No, it’s not possible to register without an e-mail address. You only need your e-mail address to register; this guarantees the security of the app.

The Click app.question: What is a Click hotspot?
The Click app.answer: You can make the Click anywhere in Belgium. The Click conducts marketing campaigns. In some cases, you can earn double points if you are in a specific geofenced zone. You can keep track of when these campaigns are active via our social media channels.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: How do I scan a piece of litter?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: Once you have logged into the Click app, you can either scroll through the menu or press the scan button in the middle. Via the scan button in the middle, you can get started by clicking the start button. Your camera is then activated and you can scan the barcode on the piece of litter. If the item does not have a barcode, you can photograph it (using the pink button on the right with a camera icon).

Scanning or photographing litter.question: Why do I need to share my location?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: We need your location to verify which Click zone you are in. We regularly conduct marketing campaigns, and you can earn extra Circular UCoins in some areas. We respect your privacy at all times.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: How do I share my location?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: Your smartphone will ask you to share your location when scanning an item. Make sure you allow this.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: Is there a limit to the number or items I can scan?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: There is a limit of 250 items per person per week.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: How can I actively promote the Click?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: You can share all your Click activities on social media and encourage others to make the Click. Follow our social media channels and share our posts whenever possible. We are stronger together, working to eliminate litter.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: How do I invite a friend?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer:
You can share on social media that you are now part of the Click. Everyone who registers will receive an initial balance of Circular UCoins as a welcome gift. Include links to the App Store and Google Play store so your friends and family can find the app quickly. Thank you. 
 https://apps.apple.com/us/app/the-click/id1570254730 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=be.fostplus.theclick 
 https://apps.apple.com/us/app/the-click/id1570254730 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=be.fostplus.theclick.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: Are special events/bonuses available?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer:
Hotspots enable you to earn more Circular UCoins. Other initiatives will be launched on an ad-hoc basis. 
 You can move up a tier from Starter to Advanced to Champion by being an active Clicker. In each tier the number of Circular UCoins you earn per item goes up by one Circular UCoin.

Scanning or photographing litter.question: What happens if my submimssion is not automatically approved?
Scanning or photographing litter.answer: If we don’t recognise your item’s barcode, we will check your submission. It will then be approved or rejected. Circular UCoins will only be added to your account for approved Clicks. We guarantee that these Clicks will be approved within five working days.

Manage your account.question: How do I register?
Manage your account.answer: Register by downloading the Click app and entering your details. You only have to enter your details and click on register. We will send you a welcome e-mail with a temporary password. You can then log in to complete your registration and change your password.

Manage your account.question: How do I log in?
Manage your account.answer: Once you have registered, you can log in to your account. Go to the login page and enter your e-mail address and password. Press the button to log in, and you can start Clicking.

Manage your account.question: How can I change/update my personal details?
Manage your account.answer: In your app, go to ‘My Profile’. You can change your details under ‘Profile’. Press the button to save your details.

Manage your account.question: I have forgotten my password. What should I do?
Manage your account.answer: Go to the login page and press the ‘Forgotten password’ link. Enter your e-mail address and press the button. You will receive a temporary password via e-mail to regain access to your account.

Manage your account.question: How do I change my password?
Manage your account.answer: In your app, go to ‘My Profile’. Press the ‘Password’ header. Enter your current and new password. Press the button to save your new password.

Manage your account.question: How do I change my e-mail address?
Manage your account.answer: In your app, go to ‘My Profile’. You can change your e-mail address under ‘Profile’. Press the button to save your details.

Manage your account.question: I've lost my phone. How can I access my account again?
Manage your account.answer: This is not a problem. Your account is stored in our database. You can log in to your account again from your new phone.

Manage your account.question: My account has been deleted. What should I do?
Manage your account.answer: Register again and create a new account.

Manage your account.question: How do I unsubscribe?
Manage your account.answer: You can remove the app from your phone at any time. You can delete your account and unsubscribe from the Click. You can send us a message via this contact form. We will complete the process within five working days.

Circular Ucoins.question: What are Circular Ucoins?
Circular Ucoins.answer: You can earn Circular UCoins by picking up litter, scanning or taking a photograph of the item, and then throwing it in a bin. You can use the Circular UCoins you earned in the web shop to purchase vouchers offering all kinds of rewards.

Circular Ucoins.question: Can I earn Circular Ucoins everywhere?
Circular Ucoins.answer: Yes. You can make the Click anywhere in Belgium and earn UCoins.

Circular Ucoins.question: How do I earn Circular Ucoins?
Circular Ucoins.answer:
Open the Click app and log in to your account. 
 Pick up a piece of litter and press the ‘Scan’ button. Share your location and activate your camera when prompted. 
 If there is a barcode on your item, bring it close to the camera. If your barcode is recognised, it will be scanned. If the barcode cannot be scanned or your item doesn’t have a barcode, take a photo of it instead. We will ask you to identify the type of litter from a suggested list. Your Click will either be automatically approved or checked manually. 
 Once your Click is approved, you will earn Circular UCoins.

Circular Ucoins.question: Is the earn rate fixed?
Circular Ucoins.answer: Depending on which tier you have reached, the earn rate for each item is fixed. As you move up a tier, your reward for each approved Click will increase.

Circular Ucoins.question: How many Circular Ucoins do I get?
Circular Ucoins.answer:
You receive five Circular UCoins as a registration bonus. After that, you will receive a number of Circular UCoins per Click, depending on your tier. 
 Five Circular UCoins when you Click in tier 1: Starter 
 Six Circular UCoins when you Click in tier 2: Advanced 
 Seven Circular UCoins when you click in tier 3: Champion 
 In hotspot zones, you can receive extra Circular UCoins depending on the campaign.

Circular Ucoins.question: Where can I see my Circular Ucoins balance?
Circular Ucoins.answer: Once you have logged in, you will see your Circular UCoins balance in the upper right-hand corner of the home screen. You can also find your Circular UCoins balance in ‘Overview’ under ‘Transactions’.

Circular Ucoins.question: How do I manage my Circular Ucoins account?
Circular Ucoins.answer: Everything linked to your Circular UCoins account can be found in ‘My Clicks’ on the start page. You’ll find your vouchers, e-mails and transactions under ‘Overview’.

Circular Ucoins.question: Can I use my Circular Ucoins for something else?
Circular Ucoins.answer: You can only use your Circular UCoins in the shop, which has a wide range of vouchers you can redeem.

Circular Ucoins.question: Can I buy Circular Ucoins?
Circular Ucoins.answer: No. Circular UCoins can only be earned by Clicking litter or your own empty packaging on the go.

Circular Ucoins.question: Can I sell Circular Ucoins?
Circular Ucoins.answer: No. You can only redeem your Circular UCoins for vouchers in the shop.

Circular Ucoins.question: How can I use Circular Ucoins?
Circular Ucoins.answer: Log in to your account and click on ‘shop’. Browse the categories or search for relevant offers. Once you find a voucher you like, add it to the basket and press ‘buy’ to complete the order. An order confirmation e-mail will be sent to your e-mail address. Your new voucher(s) will be displayed in ‘Overview’ under ‘Vouchers’.

Vouchers.question: How many Circular Ucoins do I need to purchase a voucher?
Vouchers.answer: Every voucher is assigned a different number of Circular UCoins (CUC). You will see the amount shown next to the voucher. You can also filter vouchers by amounts based on your current CUC balance.

Vouchers.question: How can I redeem vouchers?
Vouchers.answer: Log in to your account and click on ‘shop’. You can click on an available voucher to view it. Purchase the voucher you want. Your voucher is now in ‘Overview’ under ‘Vouchers’. You can show the voucher on your smartphone to the relevant outlet (shop/leisure/food etc.). You can redeem it by pressing the ‘Redeem’ button in front of the participant.

Vouchers.question: Where can I use the vouchers?
Vouchers.answer: The vouchers can be used with specific local participants/partners. You will find detailed information in the voucher description. You can also choose from several national vouchers in the shop. Click on the filter button and choose National.

Vouchers.question: How long do the vouchers remain valid?
Vouchers.answer:
The vouchers in the shop have a specified validity date. You can see when the offer will expire. 
 Vouchers are valid for five days from the date of purchase.
 Vouchers are non-transferable and cannot be shared. 
 Vouchers can only be used once.

Vouchers.question: Can I exchange my voucher for another voucher?
Vouchers.answer: No, this is not possible. Once a voucher has been purchased, it must be used or it will expire. Circular UCoins are deducted from your balance automatically.

Vouchers.question: How do I move up to a new tier?
Vouchers.answer:
By picking up more and more litter. You will reach a new tier when you exceed the number of items that have to be Clicked to open a new tier. 
 Starter: 1 - 50 items 
 Advanced: 51 - 150 items 
 Champion: +150 items

Vouchers.question: Why did I lose my *title* tier?
Vouchers.answer: Once you have earned a tier, you remain in this tier even when you redeem your points. If you are inactive for 3 consecutive months, you lose your *title* tier and move down one tier.

Fix a problem.question: I am unable to log into my account
Fix a problem.answer: Try resetting your password. Go to the login page and press the ‘Forgotten password’ link. Enter your e-mail address and press the button. You will receive a temporary password via e-mail.

Fix a problem.question: What should I do if I cannot open the Click app?
Fix a problem.answer: Make sure you have an active internet/4G connection. If the app does not open, you can delete it from your smartphone and reinstall it via the App Store or Google Play store.

Fix a problem.question: What should I do if an item can't be scanned?
Fix a problem.answer: If an item can’t be scanned, you can take a photo of it and indicate the item type.

Fix a problem.question: Where is the voucher I just bought?
Fix a problem.answer: Your voucher is in ‘Overview’ under ‘Vouchers’ in the top left-hand corner. They will stay on the ‘Vouchers’ page for a maximum of five days. You can view and download them there.

Fix a problem.question: I accidentally purchased the wrong voucher. What should I do?
Fix a problem.answer: Be careful when purchasing vouchers, as they cannot be refunded or replaced.

Fix a problem.question: Someone else has signed up using my e-mail
Fix a problem.answer: A welcome e-mail would have been sent to your e-mail address with a temporary password. Unless the other person has access to your e-mails, they will not be able to log in. If you want to be extra safe, you can reset your password.

Become a partner.question: How can I become a partner?
Become a partner.answer:
You can find information on our ‘The Click Partners’ web page. 
 You can contact us via this contact form.

Become a partner.question: A different problem
Become a partner.answer:
How can I report a problem? 
 You can report a problem via the contact form.

Partners.question: How can I take part in the Click?
Partners.answer: To take part in the Click, go to www.the-click.app/company and register.
